preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 120 g of manganese (Mn) using a precise scale. 
 2. Measure 70 g of phosphorus (P). 
 3. Measure 10 g of terbium (Tb). 
 4. Measure 10 g of yttrium (Y). 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured powders uniformly. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer to ensure even distribution of all components.
